cookie_consent.message: arsnova.click is a web app that uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience.

description.qr-code: Attendees can scan the QR code via their mobile devices to join the quiz.
description.sound: Set the sound for the background music or the countdown here.
description.reading-confirmation: Activate this option if only the question <bold>without</bold> answer options should be displayed first. Only those who confirm the reading (understanding) of the question can participate in the quiz. The number of confirmations is displayed. With the reading confirmation you can create the same conditions for all attendees at the countdown.
description.response-progress: Do you want to display the number of responses to the individual answer options during the countdown? Then activate this option. Note, however, the psychological effect: People tend to be directed to the majority (herd instinct).
description.nicknames: You can preset selectable nicknames out of multiple categories here. Hint: Block a rude nickname by clicking on the attendee in the quiz lobby.

about.title: arsnova.click
about.declaration:
A little bit Kahoot!,
a little bit ARSnova!
about.ars: First one is gamificated and the second one designed for educational use. Both are an Audience Response System (ARS).
about.developed_by: Inspired by Kahoot! a Scrum-Team of Bachelor and Master students of the TH Mittelhessen designed and developed in only 10 days this gamificated alternative to our ARSnova-Flagship arsnova.eu.
about.met_requirements: Requirements which ARSnova.click has already met:

requirements.1: Absolute data privacy: No personal files on the server. All quiz data is located at the HTML5 Local Storage of the quiz owner.
requirements.2: No registration, no installation, no costs at all
requirements.3: Same landing page for both roles: quiz master and attendee
requirements.4: Anyone can create quizzes: immediately and as much as you like!
requirements.5: Extreme easy to use and beamer friendly user interface
requirements.6: TeX-Formulas and text formatting with Markdown in questions and answer options
requirements.7: One dialog fits everything: As many answer options you like with multiple choice, single choice and surveys.
requirements.8: Edutainment: Have fun during learning with a live competition against the clock and the other players with sound effects.
requirements.9: Responsive Web design: From the smart phone to the wide screen - the design adapts thanks to Bootstrap
requirements.10: The bleading edge in modern web technologies: Meteor

text.2: Simply type in the name of the quiz. The buttons will discolour as soon as you've typed in the name of an active quiz (Join now!) or you can create a new quiz with the entered name (Make a new one!).
text.3: Now it is as simple as: Clicking. Looking. Quizzing.

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.declaration: Everyone is allowed to use the quiz app ARSnova.click for their own purposes as long as the user does not infringe German or European law.

license.title: License
license.text: ARSnova.click is a free webservice (Software as a Service). The software is Open Source und is distributed under the GNU General Public License Version 3.

musicLicense.title: Music license
musicLicense.text: The sound Chinese Gong by Daniel Simon is licensed under CC BY 3.0.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.text: We are trying to maintain the online service of ARSnova.click reliable but we cannot guarantee that. The quiz files are located exclusively in the local browser storage of the quiz owner. We do not give any legal responsibility for any data loss for example via deleting the local browser storage or by illegal usage of the service.

data_privacy.title: Data Privacy
data_privacy.declaration: This privacy statement explains to users of ARSnova.click the nature, scope and purpose of the usage of personal data by the responsible provider. The legal basis of this privacy policy can be found in the German Bundesdatenschutzgesetz (BDSG) and the German Telemediengesetz (TMG).

app_data.title: Application data
app_data.text: All quiz questions and their answer options are held by the local browser storage of the quiz owner.

access_data.title: Access data
access_data.text: Besides web server log files, no personal access data is stored.

logfiles.title: Webserver logfiles
logfiles.text: The provider collects log files about every access to the ARSnova.click system in so-called log files. The provider uses the data exclusively for statistical purposes, for the purpose of operation, security and the optimization of the service. The provider reserves the right to check the log data if there is a reasonable suspicion of unlawful use due to concrete indications.

3rdparty.title: 3rd party services
3rdparty.text: In quizzes third party services or content, such as videos from YouTube and Vimeo or graphics can be included from other websites. This requires that the provider of such content percive the user's IP address. Without the IP address the content can not be sent to the browser.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.text: Cookies are small files that make it possible to save specific (related to the device) information of the user inside the access device. The offer ARSnova.click uses cookies to observe statistical data of website's usage by Piwik (see below) to be able to detect and analyze them in order to improve the offer. The user can influence the use of cookies. Most browsers have an option to limit the storage and usage of cookies or prevent the usage of cookies completely.

piwik.title: Piwik
piwik.text: This offer uses Piwik, an open source software for statistical analysis of traffic, see piwik.org. Piwik uses cookies, which are stored on the computer of the user and allow the analysis of your use of the website. The information generated by the cookie about your use of this service is stored on the provider's server in Germany. The IP address is anonymized immediately after processing and before the storage. The user can refuse the use of cookies by changing the settings of their browser software.

text.1: The operation of the web app ARSnova.click is a free service of the TransMIT-Gesellschaft für Technologietransfer mbH, Projektbereich für mobile Anwendungen.
text.3: Fachbereich MNI – Mathematik, Naturwissenschaften und Informatik

empty_lobby.title: Leave the edit mode?
empty_lobby.text: You will be logged out. The created Question(s), including the assigned answer options and timer configurations, are stored in the local storage of your browser. Except the quiz name, all data of this session will be removed from the server.

active_quiz.title: Exit the quiz?
active_quiz.text: On resetting the session, all students will be redirected to the landing page. The current ranking and the quiz-lobby will be deleted. The created Question(s), including the assigned answer options and timer configurations, are stored in the local storage of your browser. Except the quiz name, all data of this session will be removed from the server.

exit_session_confirmation.title: Leave the quiz?
exit_session_confirmation.text: You will be removed from the quiz and your progress will be lost!

answeroptions.title: Define answers
answeroptions.show_answer_content_on_buttons: Display the answer's content on the buttons?
answeroptions.show_one_answer_per_row: Show only one answer per row?
answeroptions.emoji_info:
You can embed also one of these Emojis (external website!) in your answeroptions
Simply click on the website on the Emoji and paste it into the answeroption.

description.default_answer_row: Drag this block into the list of answeroptions to create a new one.
description.added_answers: Here are all already created answeroptions. You can change the order of the answers via drag & drop.
description.added_answer_short_text: Every answeroption contains a unique letter which can be displayed for the quiz attendees.
description.added_answer_text: Here you can enter some text for the answeroption. Markup like Markdown and LaTeX is supported.
description.added_answer_is_correct: This button determines if the answeroption is marked as correct or wrong.
description.added_answer_remove: Clicking on this button deletes the response.
description.show_answer_content_on_buttons: The response buttons for the participants can either be labeled with the letter of the response or the complete answer's text. Note, however, that too much text in the answer can be badly readable depending on the size of the viewport.
description.show_one_answer_per_row: This will increase the width of the answer option button to use the full width of the row. Use this for large formulas or texts.
description.multiple_selection_survey: Here you can set whether the participants are to go directly to the evaluation after clicking on a response of the survey, or whether a multiple selection should be possible.
description.preview: Here you can see a preview of the answer content entered on the left.
description.range_area: Here you can specify the correct answer as well as the top and lower tolerances. Please note that the input must be in natural numbers.
description.min_range: Here you can set the lower tolerance value.
description.max_range: Here you can set the upper tolerance value.
description.range_slider: With this slider you can dynamically change the upper and lower tolerances. The correct value will correspond to the mean value.
description.free_text_question_text: Here you can enter the correct answer. The responses entered by the participants are checked against this response according to the configuration.
description.config_case_sensitive: If this option is activated, the case of the entered response must match that of the reference response.
description.config_trim_whitespaces: Specifies whether the whitespaces of the entered response are to be checked.
description.config_use_keywords: This option must be activated, the order of the words of the entered response must correspond to the reference value. If this option is deactivated, it is unfortunately not possible to check the spaces and punctuation marks.
description.config_use_punctuation: This option determines whether the punctuation marks of the entered value are to be checked.
description.check_answer: Here you can test possible answers of the participants against your reference value and the current configuration.

free_text_question.title: Free text answer
free_text_question.config_trim_whitespaces: Observe white spaces in the answer
free_text_question.check_correct: The entered answer matches the provided reference.
free_text_question.check_incorrect: The entered answer does not match the provided reference.

choose_nickname.nickname_blacklist_popup: This name is (because of its meaning) not available!

no_selectable_nick_available.1: All available nicknames have been chosen.
no_selectable_nick_available.2: It is not possible to join the quiz.

description.nickname_input: Here you can enter a name, which is different from the other players.
description.choose_selectable_nick: You can select one of the available nicknames from this list.

hashtag_management.available_sessions: These quizzes are stored in your browser:
hashtag_management.delete_session_confirmation: Shall the quiz '' be removed permanently?
hashtag_management.no_sessions: There are no quizzes stored in your browser.

aria_description.splashscreen_description: List of all valid and invalid quizzes in your browser

title.2: Enter »Demo Quiz« and run it. Use the app in another browser and play the quiz in different roles.
title.3: Enter »ABCD« and run a fast quiz session with only one question and four answer options from A to D. Present the question and the content of the answers to your audience offline.
title.4: Visit our blog at arsnova.io and learn how to use quizzes in courses.

leaderboard.no_attendee_correct: No one has answered this question correctly
leaderboard.no_attendee_correct_global: Nobody has answered all the questions correctly
leaderboard.question: Question

lobby.title: Quiz Lobby
lobby.kick_member_confirmation: Shall the attendee '' be removed from the session?

description.title: The quiz lobby displays the nicknames of the attendees in antichronological order of their arrival.
description.waiting_for_players: As soon as the attendees arrived at the quiz you can start the quiz round. Note that after starting the quiz no one can log into the quiz until you start it again.

nickname_categories.title: Limit available nicknames
nickname_categories.no_nicks_selected: No nicknames selected. All nicknames are allowed.
nickname_categories.restrict_to_cas: Restrict to CAS users (THM University only)

description.type_wrapper: Here you can change the type of quiz question. Each type has different settings. Change the type by clicking on the respective box.
description.SingleChoiceQuestion: Single-choice questions contain as many answer options as you like, one of them must be marked as correct.
description.YesNoSingleChoiceQuestion: Yes|No questions contain only two answers (yes and no), one of them must be marked as correct.
description.TrueFalseSingleChoiceQuestion: True|False questions also contain only two answers (True and False), one of them must be marked as correct.
description.MultipleChoiceQuestion: Multiple-choice questions contain as many answer options as you like, of which as many as you like (at least one) can be marked as correct.
description.RangedQuestion: For the ranged question, an integer must be specified as correct. In addition, upper and lower tolerances can be entered.
description.FreeTextQuestion: In the free text query, the participant must enter any text. This is matched with the provided reference value.
description.SurveyQuestion: Surveys may contain any number of answers, none of them can be marked as right or wrong.
description.ABCDSurveyQuestion: ABCD questions contain only 4 answer options and no question text. The content must be presented offline by the Quizmaster.

questions.title: Enter question text
questions.free_text_question: Free text question (response is correct in accordance with the provided sample)

description.preview: Here is a preview of the entered text on the left.

quiz_manager.title: Quiz Manager
quiz_manager.no_added_questions: You haven't added any questions yet.
quiz_manager.question_added: To edit a question click on it.
quiz_manager.connection_lost: The connection to the server is lost

aria.btn_group: List of settings for the quiz

description.available_questions: Here you can see all types of questions from which you can choose. Each question type offers different presets and possibilities for the design of the quizzes
description.added_questions: Here you will find all your quiz questions, which are available in the quiz. To add a quiz question to the quiz, either drag it from the left stack or click the quiz query in the left pile. By clicking on the inserted question, you can set the content of the question.
description.back_button: You can go back any time. The quiz is saved immediately.
description.forward_button: If the quiz is valid and you are connected to the server, you can continue to the quiz lobby and open the quiz for participants.

quiz_summary.title: Summary
quiz_summary.question: Question

reasons.question_text_too_small: The question text is too short
reasons.question_text_too_long: The question text is too long
reasons.no_valid_answers: There must be at least one correct answer
reasons.one_valid_answer_required: There must be exactly one correct answer
reasons.invalid_range: The minimum range must be smaller than the maximum range
reasons.invalid_correct_value: The correct value must be in the scope of the range
reasons.answer_text_empty: The answer's text is not allowed to be empty

quiz_summary.no_selected_nicks: No nicknames selected. All nicknames are valid.

description.header: Here is the summary of the entire quiz round
description.session_url: Under this URL, participants can enter the quiz as soon as you release it
description.question_group_validation: The validation of the quiz round fails if the quiz has not yet been completed. This includes non - existing quizzes, missing or incomplete response options, non - set timers, etc.
description.restrict_to_cas: If this setting is active, the participants must register at the central authentication service of the University of Applied Sciences Mittelhessen in order to participate in the quiz
description.question_item: This section contains information about the selected question.
description.validation_errors: The validation errors listed here can be useful in troubleshooting.

decent_blue.name: Decent Blue
decent_blue.description: A decent blue grey to controll the users focus on the main aspects of Quizzing

material_hope.name: Material Hope
material_hope.description: Google Material and a spark of hope.

material-blue.name: Material blue
material-blue.description: Google Material in blue and green.

GreyBlue-Lime.name: GreyBlue Lime
GreyBlue-Lime.description: GreyBlue with a hint of Lime.

timer.title: Set countdown
timer.description: Here you can set the countdown for the quiz question. As soon as it expires, or all participants have answered, the quiz round is ended.

confidence_level.title: How confident are you in your answer?

markdown_bar.info_content: You can use Markdown markup for your text in ARSnova.click. Frequently used markup options are available via the button bar which is visible on all supported input fields. Additionally ARSnova.click supports GitHub Flavored Markdown

sound.finish_music_detailed: Sound at the end of the Countdown

edit_session_confirmation.title: Do you want to edit the quiz?
edit_session_confirmation.text: All attendees will be removed and the leaderboard will be deleted.

reminder_leaderboard_data.title: Warning
reminder_leaderboard_data.text: The data of the leaderboard will be removed as soon as you leave the quiz. You can download the data for later use here.

return_to_lobby.title: Warning
return_to_lobby.text: If you proceed to the quiz lobby all played quiz rounds will be reset.

error.title: Notification
error.set_text_error: The text of the error splashscreen can only be set after it has been rendered!

error_messages.update_failed: The update of the question failed.
error_messages.session_exists_warning: This session does already exist on the server!
error_messages.session_exists_arsnova_import: Please enter a name for your arsnova quiz:
error_messages.session_exists_new: To import it it is required to rename the session:
error_messages.session_not_available: Session is currently not available for joining
error_messages.private_browsing: If you use ARSnova.click in private browsing you can only join a quiz as an attendee. Unfortunately your browser seems to reject any write access to the local storage. Please use ARSnova.click only via a normal browser tab. Your anonymity will be respected even without using the private mode.
error_messages.kicked_from_quiz: You've been kicked from the quiz!
error_messages.nick_already_exists: This nickname does already exist in the quiz
error_messages.not_authorized: Either there is no quiz or you don't have write access
error_messages.maximum_answer_options_exceeded: Maximum number of possible answer options exceeded
error_messages.hashtag_not_found: No such hashtag with the given key
error_messages.duplicate_response: User has already given a response
error_messages.answeroption_not_found: There is no answer option with the given answerOptionNumber
error_messages.response_timeout: Response was given out of time range
error_messages.insert_leaderboard_failed: Error while adding response set to leaderboard
error_messages.session_closed: The quiz session has been closed
error_messages.invalid_data: The imported files are corrupt or the access is denied!
error_messages.invalid_input_data: The entered data is either invalid or the access is denied!
error_messages.duplicate_user: You are attempting to participate with a second identity. This is not possible!
error_messages.invalid_login: This quiz can only be started by an authorized CAS user.
error_messages.maximum_quizzes_exceeded: Exceeded the maximum number of parallel quizzes on this server.
